trigger.Name: trFindThing
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 25*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 25*0.74
Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) Plf:SetThrottle(0)
FlyAround(6, 0, 6, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
trigger:Deactivate()
